title: Introducing 'The Summoners Ladder'

embed.description: Welcome to the Summoners Ladder 2018 split 1,Summoners' Society is happy to present 'The Summoners Ladder' but with a...

body:
Welcome to the Summoners Ladder 2018 split 1,

Summoners’ Society is happy to present ‘The Summoners Ladder’ but with a twist! This is a weekly tournament where you and a group of friends will be able to battle it out against other summoners.

The ladder Progression:
Summoners Ladder 
Teams: Open 
Length: 16 weeks

-->Oceanic Summoners Circuit (Private invite sent) 
Teams: Top 8 teams from the Summoners Ladder
Length: 8 weeks

-->Summoners Private ladder (Private invite sent) 
Teams: All the rest of the teams from the Summoners Ladder
Length: 8 weeks

Make sure you get your {{champion:17}}'s ready, you will need a minimum of 5 per rosters to sign up!
